entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 10. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
